config.name: CHANNEL_WIDGET_1
config.description: This is a set of configuration controls for one channel. Each row corresponds to one channel.

config.name: CHANNEL_ENABLE_1
config.description: This checkbox represents whether the channel is enabled or not. Disabled channels cannot be used.

config.name: CHANNEL_DEVICE_1
config.description: This represents the device that is configured on the selected channel, either AD74413R or MAX14906.

config.name: CHANNEL_FUNCTION_1
config.description: This shows the available function for each device. Both devices have their own specific functions.

config.name: DRAW_AREA
config.description: A 1:1 mapping of the SWIOT board. It will display a route from the selected device to the I/O channel.

config.name: APPLY_BUTTON
config.description: After being done with the configuration, this button will switch the board to runtime mode and display the available tools.

max14906.name: DIO_DIGITAL_CHANNEL_SPACE
max14906.description: The channels configured as MAX14906 will be displayed here, or nothing if there are none. Each channel shows its own controls.

max14906.name: GENERAL_SETTINGS
max14906.description: The general settings tab displays settings that influence all channels. (e.g. The Timespan)

max14906.name: RUN_BUTTON
max14906.description: When pressed, the run button starts polling from all channels every second. The values will be plotted in the plot section of each channel.

max14906.name: CONFIG_BUTTON
max14906.description: The config button switches the board to config mode, this will allow setting a different configuration.

ad74413r.name: AD74413R_PLOT
ad74413r.description: The plot displays the values read from all channels of AD74413R.

ad74413r.name: AD74413R_SETTINGS
ad74413r.description: Display the general settings of AD74413R or the advanced settings for each of its channels.

ad74413r.name: SINGLE_BUTTON
ad74413r.description: Reads one data buffer from all enabled channels.

ad74413r.name: RUN_BUTTON
ad74413r.description: Starts the data buffer acquisition continuously.

ad74413r.name: CONFIG_BUTTON
ad74413r.description: The config button switches the board to config mode, this will allow setting a different configuration.

faults.name: AD74413R_NUMERIC
faults.description: The hexadecimal raw value read from the device.

faults.name: AD74413R_RESET_STORED
faults.description: Pressing RESET STORED clears the stored part from all fault bits.

faults.name: AD74413R_CLEAR_SELECTION
faults.description: All faults can be selected and highlighted. By pressing this button all the highlighted faults will be deselected.

faults.name: AD74413R_FAULTS_GROUP
faults.description: Shows all faults available for this device.

faults.name: AD74413R_EXPLANATIONS
faults.description: Displays the explanation for all faults available to this device, the explanations get highlighted when the fault bit is active.

faults.name: SINGLE_BUTTON
faults.description: Reads the value of the faults once for both devices.

faults.name: RUN_BUTTON
faults.description: Starts polling the fault values from both devices every second.

faults.name: CONFIG_BUTTON
faults.description: The config button switches the board to config mode, this will allow setting a different configuration.
